name: Stay Alive | A Zombie Shooter
description:
Stay Alive is a fun, exiting first person shooter. It is a single player game with one goal, stay alive. The controls are simple traditional FPS controls.

____________________________________________________________

W,A,S,D- Move around

Mouse- Look around

Space- Jump

Tab&Shift- Switch between guns

***NEWEST VERSION IS 1.5. IF YOU DON'T HAVE 1.5 DOWNLOAD NOW!
